content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine at position (-18.5, 19.5)
- Boiler at position (-13.5, 20.0)
- Offshore pump at position (-11.5, 26.5)
- Pipe groups connecting the boiler and offshore pump to the steam engine

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab at position (-17.5, 23.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to insufficient resources
- Ensure that the lab has enough automation science packs before attempting to start research. The lab requires 10 automation science packs to initiate research.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. 

### Errors related to power connections
- Check that all entities requiring power are properly connected to the power network. The steam engine is currently not connected to the power network, which may hinder its operation.
